name: Yathzee (CP Verlag)
overview: Published in Magic Disk 64 1992/06. "Alia iacta sunt" (or est?)! You will encounter this saying in the near future at the push of a button and joystick movement. The aim of the game is to roll as many points or chains of points as possible. To do this, you can click on the cubes that you want to keep. They are then displayed in a lighter color. If you then click on "Shuffle" the dice will be rolled again (three times in total!). You can distribute your points as follows: Ones - Just the dice with the value one are counted. twos threes Quad - Analog "One" Fives Six Triple double - you must have three dice of the same value on the face Foursome - Here you have four of a kind on the face Chance - The points are added up and added to your score. Full House - Three "fives" and two "sixes" result in z. B. a full house. small street - z. E.g.: 12346 major street - e.g. B.: 12345 or 23456 Yathzee - The highest of emotions! six of the same dice!
